## calculateDateTime() function

计算向前或向后N天的具体日期时间

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function calculateDateTime(
  originDateTime: DateValue,
  n: number,
  dateSep?: string,
  timeSep?: string
): string;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

string

_(Optional)_ 时间分隔符

</td></tr>
